title: Manage Site Dewatering Operations
description: After heavy rain, an excavation is filled with water. The superintendent must manage dewatering operations in compliance with environmental permits.

tasks.description: Deploy a pump and filter bag to the excavation to begin dewatering.
tasks.expected_outcome: Equipment is set up to remove the water.

tasks.description: Verify that the discharged water is being directed to the correct storm drain inlet as specified in the SWPPP.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the discharge location is compliant.

tasks.description: Log the dewatering activity, including start and end times, in the daily log.
tasks.expected_outcome: The activity is documented for compliance records.
